title: `Quarkus Security with Jakarta Persistence` guide doesn't mention `security-jpa-reactive` extension
body:
### Describe the bug

`Quarkus Security with Jakarta Persistence` guide doesn't mention `security-jpa-reactive` extension

https://quarkus.io/guides/security-jpa talks just about `security-jpa` extension for Hibernate "Classic".

`security-jpa-reactive` extension is only mentioned in https://quarkus.io/guides/security-basic-authentication-tutorial

### Expected behavior

`Quarkus Security with Jakarta Persistence` guide covers both `security-jpa-reactive` and `security-jpa` extensions

### Actual behavior

`Quarkus Security with Jakarta Persistence` guide is not mentioning `security-jpa-reactive` extension

### How to Reproduce?
